programme.title: Así en el barrio como en el cielo
Nada Personal
programme.desc: Nada Personal es una serie que trae Discovery Channel para Latinoamérica donde asesinos a sueldo son contratados para matar sin piedad.La serie tipo documental Nada Personal es presentada por Steve Schirippa, conocido por la serie de mafiosos “Los Soprano”. En este programa se verán historias verídicas de asesinatos hechos por contrato.En cada capítulo de la serie, se narra la historia de un trabajo profesional que trata de cómo se contacta, las instrucciones dadas al asesino para llevar a cabo las peticiones del cliente.

programme.title: The Lost King
programme.desc: The true story of amateur historian Philippa Langley, who took on Britain's most eminent historians, forcing them to rethink the legacy of a controversial ruler.

programme.title: Corsage
programme.desc: Faced with a future of strict ceremonies and royal duties, Empress Elisabeth of Austria rebels against her public image and comes up with a plan to protect her legacy.

programme.title: Monica
programme.desc: A woman returns home to care for her ailing mother, whom she hasn't seen in years.

programme.title: The Opening Act
programme.desc: A stand-up comedian encounters relentless hecklers, drunken groupies and hard-to-impress DJs after landing a gig as an emcee for his idol.

programme.title: Rare Objects
programme.desc: A young woman with a traumatic past seeks to rebuild her life when she begins working at a New York City antique shop.

programme.title: Bar Fight!
programme.desc: Having split everything in their lives after their break-up, a man and a woman must compete in a ridiculous custody battle for their prized drinking bar.

programme.title: The Almond and the Seahorse
programme.desc: An archaeologist and an architect fight to reimagine a future after a traumatic brain injury leaves them adrift from the people they love.

programme.title: Life Upside Down
programme.desc: Three couples who know one another are stuck at home during the beginning of lockdown.

programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: A couple invite their closest friends for Christmas dinner at their idyllic home in the English countryside. The world outside is facing impending doom, and no amount of gifts, games or wine can make mankind's imminent destruction go away.

programme.title: Christmas Eve in Miller's Point
programme.desc: A family gathers on Christmas Eve for what could be the last holiday in their ancestral home. As the night wears on and tensions arise, one of the teenagers sneaks out with her friends to claim the wintry suburb for her own.

programme.title: Christmas With the Campbells
programme.desc: When Jesse is dumped right before the holidays by her boyfriend, Shawn, his parents convince her to still spend Christmas with them, and Shawn's handsome cousin, while Shawn is away.

programme.title: Spin Me Round
programme.desc: Flown to an Italian immersion program on her company's dime, what starts as a romantic getaway devolves into chaos.

programme.title: Pretty Problems
programme.desc: A couple on the rocks are pulled along by absurdly wealthy strangers for a wine country getaway that turns into the most unhinged weekend of their lives.
